fact: The Wolf is also known as the Gray Wolf. Another name for it is the Timber Wolf.
Habitats include the northern areas of North America and other northern continents.
Wolves howl, which is how they communicate with each other.
Wolves typically live up to 13 years in the wild
Wolves have a total of 42 teeth
Wolves can have a pack size of up to 30 or more members.
Wolves are carnavores (meat eaters). They typically feed on moose and deer.
Wolves are fast! They can run up to 38 miles per hour!
